, Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about a implant that could tell Google Inc. what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and that an implant would cross the line. On Thursday's call with analysts, he ventured close, but not too close, to repeating the line, referring to his upcoming dealings with regulators as

Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., that would deny federal family-planning funds to any organization that performs abortions. Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said. Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
